examples: And that means you could get ketchup out of the bottle in two ways: either give it a series of long, slow languid shakes making sure you don't ever stop applying force, or you could hit the bottle once very, very hard.

examples: And this case languishes.

words.defineVi: để mất sức mạnh hoặc năng lượng

examples: As the sun rose over the horizon, Mark emerged from his deep slumber and joined the rest of his family in the living room, finally in the land of the living.

After surviving a dangerous accident, Lily emerged alive and well, grateful for a second chance at life.
words.defineEn: to become visible after coming out of somewhere
words.defineVi: trở nên hữu hình sau khi ra khỏi một nơi nào đó

examples: Despite the emergence of new competitors, the company's brand remains alive and well in the market, attracting loyal customers.

examples: About 15% of the kids demonstrated insecure ambivalent attachment.

examples: She became more ambitious as the years passed.

The startup company is reaching for the moon with its ambitious goals to revolutionize the industry.

words.defineEn: trying or wishing to gain great success, power, or wealth
